New Records: Mohammed Rizwan became the first player to score over 1,000 runs in a calendar year in T20 international cricket
Key Match Events: Matthew Wade hit a hat-trick of sixes off Shaheen Afridi to send Australia to the final
Pakistan's innings included a brutal slugfest and key performances from Mohammed Rizwan and Fakhar Zaman
Shadab Khan's spell of 4-26 was the best in a T20 World Cup semi-final
Australia's chase down of 177 with an over to spare was a turning point
Pre-Game Insights: Matthew Hayden warned Fakhar Zaman was finding his range before the match
Pakistan's bowlers initially dominated the innings
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Finch was dismissed early by Shaheen Afridi
David Warner's counter-attack helped Australia recover
The match was a pivotal moment in Australia's tournament journey
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a repeat of the 2015 50-over final against New Zealand
Weather and field conditions were challenging
Others: Pakistan's wicketkeeper played with a facial injury after being hit by a bouncer
The game started with Shaheen Afridi as the new ball bowler
